post.body: what are you trying to do, kill me?!?!
oh shame, it's not the same at all. I needed my own intervention yesterday so I wouldn't buy UF sweatshirts in the bkstore :)
- good news @ourlaboroflove is on here!!!! They even twitpic amazing shots. I am in LOVE!
- give a well done to Patrick on the centerpieces. Send a pic?
wellll there are so many varieties of foam fingers here at the UF bkstore...hard to decide.
DONT WORRY I didn't buy it! @Amy_O oh dear god noooo! Ok guys crisis averted!
haha just make sure that you plan time to visit me :)
b/c chad & liz thought it would be fun. Haha.
@lizdez YAY! Maybe Cate can be the flower girl, if it isn't the same wkend as Jamie's. So when is it?
@lizdez - UMMM HI! It's me calling you to hear a story or something. PICK UP YOUR PHONE :) :) :)
Just finished a photography class. Super relaxed brazilian prof. 'bring a camera next wk. If not, that's ok!'
In the UF: I'm considering buying a UF sweatshirt! Help -I need an intervention!!!
Just found out there 27,000 bicycles on campus. I bet they are ALL orange & blue. Weird.
Ok here's the thing: there is orange&blue everywhere! I just walked on orange & blue carpet.
WTC?!?! They just had an auditorium full of ppl learn the 'gator chomp' and yell 'it's great to be a FL gator!!' haha where am I?
Up at 6 :( Dropped g @ school @ 7:30! Now to orientation for me. Coffeeee?!?!
For the Record: That was supposed to be "LISTENING to: Andrew Bird's Noble Beast."
Reading: "Exclusive First Listen: Andrew Bird's 'Noble Beast' : NPR Music" ( http://tinyurl.com/9lardx )
For all my Andrew Bird loving friends-NPR has given us a gift http://tinyurl.com/7z8hr3-listen to the new album 'Noble Beast'!!
gahhhh @Amy_O we forgot to do those paintings for grant and cate's room! Oh well - you will just have to come back...tomorrow.
